inclusion.criterion: Extracranial carotid or vertebral artery dissection with symptom onset within the last 7 days.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Imaging evidence of definite or probable dissection on MRI/MRA, CTA or ultrasound.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Carotid U/S that showed significant bilateral carotid stenosis

notes: Patient has carotid bruits and occasional dizziness, with significant bilateral carotid stenosis on ultrasound.
